sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不必说，这一切都是从无线电广播报道中搜集来的第二手信息。

sentences.en: Asking. The fist emperor 98 selects the biochemistry Lu Cull's method.
sentences.cn: 求. 拳皇98选出生化卢卡尔的方法.

sentences.en: Cull deeply loves his team, his training and the teammate.
sentences.cn: 卡尔热爱他的球队 、 他的教练和队友.

sentences.en: Each autumn, the villagers will cull the sick members of the herd.
sentences.cn: 每年秋天, 村民们都要挑出畜群里的病弱杀掉.

sentences.en: Environment Secretary David Miliband told parliament the cull should be finished later on Monday.
sentences.cn: 环境大臣戴维对国会说,宰杀行动将于星期天晚上结束.

sentences.en: In the reserves of Zimbabwe and South Africa, annual culls are already routine.
sentences.cn: 在津巴布韦和南非的自然保护区，对病弱动物每年所进行的宰杀剔除已成惯例。

sentences.en: It is usually good practice to cull the poorest prior to field planting.
sentences.cn: 通常在实践上的好方法是在出圃栽植前挑出最弱的苗木.

sentences.en: Jake had said, Cull has plants the ability Could ruin oneself once deep love thing.
sentences.cn: 杰克就说过, 卡尔有种能力,能把自己曾经深爱的东西毁掉.

sentences.en: Said Dr. Cull to the high school students touring the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 卡尔博士对前来参观实验室的高中生们说.
每年对海豹的选择性宰杀

sentences.en: The main control strategy is to rapidly cull infected poultry and minimise direct contact with humans.
sentences.cn: 禽流感的主要控制策略是宰杀感染的家禽及减少其与人的直接接触.

sentences.en: They are then taken back to the slaughterhouse, where workers cull them and excise their livers.
sentences.cn: 然后它们会被送回屠宰场，那里的工人会进行精选，并切除它们的肝脏。
